projectName: Coffee Prices vs Developer Productivity Dashboard
description: A static data mashup dashboard visualizing the relationship between global coffee prices and developer productivity signals, fetching real-time data from public APIs
functionalRequirements: Display line chart of monthly coffee prices over time
Display line chart of monthly developer activity over time
Align both charts to the same time axis
Display static text summary of observed trends
Load data from public APIs via fetch() API
Handle API failures gracefully with error messages
Provide mock data fallback when APIs are unavailable
nonFunctionalRequirements: Fully static HTML/CSS/JavaScript with no backend
Responsive layout for desktop, tablet, and mobile
No build process required for running the dashboard
Chart rendering using Chart.js via CDN
No user inputs, filters, buttons, or controls
Comprehensive test coverage with unit and property-based tests
Retry logic with exponential backoff for failed API calls
constraints: Must use only HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript
Must use Chart.js library from CDN
Data must be fetched from public APIs
Must be deployable to GitHub Pages
assumptions: Public APIs are accessible and return valid data
API responses contain valid JSON with expected structure
Mock data is used when APIs fail
Node.js is available for running tests during development
